text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Most stupid comment from a incredibly stupid orange man. Obama left Trump without working Coronavirus tests. Millions are laughing at how stupid that comment is considering there was not a virus test for the strain. Wow you are the biggest DF I have ever seen!
